titleStmt.title: The Princess of Cleve, as it was acted at the Queens Theatre in Dorset-Garden / by Nath. Lee ...
titleStmt.author: Lee, Nathaniel, 1653?-1692.
La Fayette, Madame de (Marie-Madeleine Pioche de La Vergne), 1634-1693. La princesse de Cleves.

notesStmt.note: Printed with a new prologue and epilogue and not those originally written for the play by Dryden.
Based on Madame de la Fayette's romance of the same name.
Another edition in 1689 with imprint: "for Abel Roper."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
